overview: Alouette, a raunchy short musical from Israel about love in the psychiatric ward, depicts the story of Ido, a young psychology trainee, and his complicated relationship with one of the patients, The eccentric widower Eliezer, who is in love with Alouette, a magical singing bird.
tagline: Alouette, a raunchy short musical from Israel about love in the psychiatric ward.
title: Alouette
